title: POLY-PTX Eco Smart combi-fleece mix wheel
description:
Metal application: Matting, satin finishing, removal of light scratches, rust, oxide etc.
Wood application: Smoothing the surface, removing old paint, dirt etc.

Features:
- High-quality nylon fleece with versatile high-grade corundum abrasive fabric for even use over the entire service life
- Higher material removal in less time than pure fleece wheels without intermediate layers of grinding flaps
- Ideal speed: 1,000–2,000 min⁻¹
- Maximum speed: 5,000 min⁻¹
- Eco Smart holder for vibration-free work and 100% concentricity
- Price advantage compared to normal tool holders (no costs for inner core, inner sleeves or cast resin)

specifications.material: Nylon fleece with corundum abrasive fabric
